entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 7.

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
